cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 4 Bed Privacy Share + Attached Ensuite with bathroom right outside your door is the ultimate space for that single traveller, a couple of friends or group of 4.  A/C and equipped with double power point, bed light, personal shelf and secure locker unit.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

dorms.name: Standard 10 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
10 Bed Share + 2 Ensuite is very roomy, light and airy.  Amazing shower facilities at a 1:5 ratio in a big dorm.  You won't believe the size of the room! Perfect space to meet lots of friends and great for group bookings.

A/C and equipped with USB port

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Deluxe 6 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Enjoy some privacy with curtains on each bunk of our 6-share room with ensuite. Featuring a balcony and a view, this room has A /C and is equipped with a hair dryer, personal power points, bed lights, personal shelves and a secure locker units.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our first floor Private King + Shared Ensuite is a super comfy King bed splits to twin single. There is a sliding door out to the covered walkway and the ensuite is shared with the Private Queen.  Perfect for a minimum 1 night stay. Advise if twin setup.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 17th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 17th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
